Package backend.library

Class Summary
CategoryMedia Used to store all of the MediaFiles within a single category.
ImageFile This class represents an image file.
LibraryObject This very simple object provides the basis for all other LibraryObjects (the ProgramMedia, CategoryMedia, MediaFiles, even the MediaLibrary itself) It provides basic logging ability and access to the actual directory or file that this LibraryObject originally came from.
MediaFile Every file we can display is a kind of MediaFile.
MediaLibrary The MediaLibrary contains all of the media files that Pittsburgh Voyager uses.
ProgramMedia This class is used to store all of the media for an individual educational program for Pittsburgh Voyager.
StationMedia This class is designed to contain all of the media files for a particular station.
ThumbLabel This JLabel helps to draw a thumbnail image.
